EmailTemplate.name: D&S HAPP Eblast 2016.HAPP Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: H is for HAPPy
EmailTemplate.textOnly: TAKE OFF HAPPY! HAPP IS SUPPORT WHEN YOU NEED IT Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) is an extended service program offering full coverage for all Honeywell avionics. Fixed price with an annual contract No-charge exchanges, repairs or rentals 24/7 AOG emergency service Fleet discounts Watch why HAPP could be the right solution. <[[https://youtu.be/sW3QxclOgWc]]> WATCH HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/helohapp]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://m.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Sign up for the Helicopter Newsletter here. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/newsletter]]> Contact Sales <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/avionics-protection-plan]]> Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://www.honeywell.com/privacy-statement]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us]]>
